description:
Unity has officially launched tools for visionOS, Apple’s new operating system for its Vision Pro spatial computing headset. The support will allow developers to use Unity’s development tools and workflow to build immersive experiences for the Vision Pro. The announcement comes ahead of the Vision Pro headset’s launch on 2 February 2024. Unity’s templates, samples... Read more »

The post Unity launches XR app building tools for Apple’s Vision Pro appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Unity launches XR app building tools for Apple’s Vision Pro
